## IRegisterWithAs.named() method

Specifies named registration. Registration can be resolved only using the name provided

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
named(name: string): RegisterWithName<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | a value that should be used during service resolution |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RegisterWithName<T>`

- an instance of [RegisterWithName](./typeioc.registerwithname.md) interface
